courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: Learn the basics of programming using Python. This course covers fundamental concepts and hands-on exercises.

courses.title: Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Become a full-stack web developer. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Node.js.

courses.title: Data Science with Python
courses.description: Master data science techniques using Python. This course includes data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

courses.title: Graphic Design Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design. This course covers typography, color theory, and using design software.

courses.title: Advanced Machine Learning
courses.description: Dive deep into machine learning algorithms and techniques. This course covers neural networks, deep learning, and AI applications.
